" We will collect and use your personal information only for the purposes described in this statement:
1.1 To maintain and improve services as well as to make the product stable when you enter the Meizu App Store to view, download, install, and manage apps, we need to collect the following information: device information (including device identifier, screen size, operating system, terminal model, networking mode, mobile country code, resolution, and system language), Meizu App Store client usage data (including app version number, app downloading channel, time when you open/close the app, data of in-app click, and data of visiting history), app information (including installed app list, apps downloaded, installation history, app uninstallation data, and app search history), IP address, and country/region.
This type of information is the basic information that must be collected in order to provide the services of downloading, installing, and managing by App Store. Your information below will be used for personalized display of app browsing: device identifiers, installed app list, apps downloaded and installation history, app search history. If you do not provide such information, you will not be able to use our services properly.
1.2 When you log in to the Flyme account (once named Meizu account), you can use the following services: app reviews, paid-apps purchases, lucky draws, gifts, coupons, game subscriptions. Therefore we need to collect your Flyme account to identify your user identity. If you do not provide such information, you will not be able to use the services mentioned above properly. But it will not affect you using other services of the App Store. If you provide additional information such as avatar, nickname, etc., it will help us to provide you with better service and experience. If you do not provide such information, it will not affect you using other services of the App Store.
1.3 When you write a review on an app, your review is stored on our servers because storage is necessary for writing a review. If you do not allow us to store such information, you will not be able to write a review on an app properly. But it will not affect you using other services of the App Store.
1.4 When you purchase a paid app, you will fulfill the payment via MeizuPay Secure Payment. We need to collect your payment history for copyright protection. Payment history are personally sensitive. If you do not provide such information, you will not be able to purchase a paid app properly. But it will not affect you using other services of the App Store.
1.5 When you participate in an event and receive physical prizes, we need to collect the following information: phone number, address, contacts. Among them, the phone number is personally sensitive information. The purpose of collecting such information is to contact you, and send you the prize you get. If you do not provide such information, you will not be able to receive the physical prizes. But it will not affect you using other services of the App Store.
1.6 When you collect gifts and use the coupon, we need to collect your gift redeem code, coupon, mCoin, gift collecting record, and coupon usage record so that you can query and calculate your expenditure and balance. Among them, gift redeem code and mCoin are personally sensitive. If you do not provide such information, you will not be able to use the services mentioned above properly. But it will not affect you using other services of the App Store.
1.7 When you subscribe a game, your subscription record is stored on our servers because storage is necessary for subscription. If you do not allow us to store such information, you will not be able to use the mentioned service properly, but it will not affect you using other services of the App Store.
When we want to use the information for other purposes not mentioned by this statement, we will ask for your consent in advance.
When we want to use information collected for a specific purpose for other purposes, we will ask for your consent in advance.
2. Providing your personal information to third-party service providers
2.1 The event prizes of this app are issued by Meizu or third-party partners and delivered by third-party logistics service providers. To do so, we need to provide your personal information to the third-party partners and the third-party logistics service providers to award prizes, including: address, phone number, contacts.
2.2 When you share content in this app to WeChat, Weibo or other third-party app, we need to collect and provide your following information to WeChat, Weibo or other third-party app: device identifier.
3. Your Data Subject Rights
To make it easier for you to access, correct and delete your personal information while using the Meizu App Store, and to protect your right to withdraw your license to use your personal information, we have provided you with appropriate settings when we design the product, which you can use with reference to the following instructions. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions regarding your data subject rights, please contact us through the contact information at the beginning of this statement and exercise your rights.
3.1 Manage Personal Information
You can access and manage your personal information in the following ways:
3.1.1 Access to your personal information (1) You have access to your personal information, except for exceptions specified in the laws and regulations. You can access your own personal information by: Flyme Account: if you want to access or edit personal profile information and payment information in your Flyme account, change your password, add security information, or close your account, you can do it through Account Management. Installation history: you can view the history of your downloads and installed apps in the installation history. Download Management: you can view, manage or clear your downloaded apps in this download management. (2) If you are unable to access such personal information through the above paths, you can contact Meizu Customer Service at any time. We will respond to your request within 30 days. (3) For other personal information that you may create during the use of our products or services, we will provide it to you at your request. 3.1.2 Update, correct or supplement your personal information You have the right to request us to update, correct or supplement your personal information when you find that we make it wrong about your personal information. You can apply for corrections or supplements as specified in 3.1.1 Access to Your Personal Information.
3.1.3 Delete your personal information (1) You may delete some of your personal information by the way listed in 3.1.1 Access to your personal information. (2) In the following cases, you may request us to delete your personal information: a) If we deal with personal information in violation of laws and regulations; b) If we collect and use your personal information without your express consent; c) If we deal with personal information in violation of the agreement between you and us; d) If you are no longer using our products or services, or you close your Flyme account on your own initiative; e)If we have permanently ceased to provide you with products or services.
3.2 Message Prompt
When you use the App Store service, you may receive messages such as activities, rewards, comments, etc., which you can turn off at Me > Settings > Notifications.
3.3 App Update Notifications
When there is a new version of the app on your device, we display the update information of the app in the notification bar. You can turn off App Update Notifications by going to Me > Settings > App Update Notifications.
4. Data storage location and period
4.1 Data storage location
The personal information we collect and generate under this service will be stored in the territory of the People's Republic of China.
4.2 Data Storage Term
We will only retain your personal information for the time necessary to achieve the purpose and will delete or anonymize your personal information after the following retention time unless otherwise required by laws and regulations.
Your following information will be saved for 1 year: device information (including device identifier, screen size, operating system, terminal model, networking mode, mobile country code, resolution, system language), Meizu App Store client usage data (including app version number, app downloading channel, and time when you open/close the app), app information (including installed app list, apps downloaded, installation history, and app search history), and contact information (including phone number, address, contacts), gift redeem code, gift collecting record, coupon information, coupon usage record, subscription record, comments and country/region, your IP address, data of in-app click, data of visiting history, and app uninstallation data.
Your Flyme account information, including the Flyme account, nickname, and avatar, will be saved until you delete your Flyme account.
In addition, in the event of a cessation of operation of our products or services, we will notify you by sending notices, announcements, etc., and delete your personal information or anonymize it within a reasonable period of time.
5. Updates to this Privacy Policy
Our Privacy Policy may be changed. 5.1 We do not restrict your rights under this Privacy Policy without your express consent. We will publish any changes to the Privacy Policy on a dedicated page (Setup > About > Privacy Policy). 5.2 For major changes, we will also provide you with more noticeable notices (including notification of changes to be sent to you by means of a bullet box). Major changes referred to in this policy include but are not limited to: (1) Significant changes have taken place in our service model. Such as the purpose of personal information processing, the type of personal information processing, the use of personal information, etc.
(2) Significant changes we have made in control and other aspects. E.G. Owner changes such as mergers and acquisitions, etc.;
(3) When personal information security impact assessment report indicates that there is a high risk;
(4) When your rights to participate in the processing of personal information and how they are exercised change significantly;
(5) When the responsible department for handling the security of personal information, the contact information and complaint channels change.
This Agreement shall enter into effect on the date when it is updated.
Updated: April 2019 "
Meizu App Store requires you agree with %s to use

"Meizu App Store (or App Store) business is operated by Meizu Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as We or Meizu) for downloading, installing and managing products (or services) of third-party apps. This Privacy Policy is designed to help you understand what data we will collect, why it will be collected, what it will be used to do and how we protect it. Understanding these contents is essential for you to exercise your personal rights and protect your personal information. Please take the time to read this policy carefully before using this product (or service).
This product shall mean the Meizu App Store Client.
Personal information shall mean any information that is electronically or otherwise recorded and that can be used alone or in combination with other information to identify a particular natural person or to reflect the activity of a particular natural person.
Personal sensitive information shall include ID card number, personal biometric information, bank account number, property information, whereabouts, transaction information, personal information of children under (or equal to) 14 years old, etc.
Personal information deletion shall mean the act of removing personal information in the system involved in providing daily services, so that it can not be retrieved or accessed.
Additional information shall mean server values on your website or application that may be automatically received and recorded by this product when you use this product/service. It includes, but is not limited to, the keywords you enter, the web page you request to access and other records, the operating status of the product or service, the network environment, the exception logs, and other basic records that are clearly and objectively reflected on the product or service server. The aforementioned basic records and other information that cannot identify your personal identity are not your personal information.
Please read and understand this Meizu App Store Privacy Policy before using our products/services.
You promise to be an adult when you start using this product/service. If you are a minor, your guardian is required to agree to use this app and to agree to the terms and conditions of the app.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, or if you have any questions about our collection, use, disclosure, transmission or storage of your personal information, please contact our Data Protection Officer via the email DPO@meizu.com.
Generally, we will respond within 30 days.
If you are not satisfied with our response, especially when our personal information processing acts have undermined your legitimate rights and interests, you may also resolve it by bringing proceedings in People's Court of competent jurisdiction, lodging a complaint with an industry self-regulatory association or with relevant government administration.
"
